description:
Controls: Keyborad (WASD) and ...................................(Mouse When Needed)

((((Refresh Page If Controls Are NOT Working.....................))))

Press F11 For Better Experience :)

Pixelated Mystery Horror Puzzle ... where are you? why are you here? what does it all mean?

"Oh God let me out.
No one to listen,
To hear when you shout.

Used to wish for a window,
To see birds, trees and sky,
But you're better without one -
Stops you aiming too high."

- puff
